channel.title: [Bug-Major] HEV Suit Armor Display Not Functional
channel.description:
The HEV armor display doesn't seem to show up. Everything else does, just not the armor display.
Status:
hostname: Black Mesa version : 100001/24 100001 insecure map : bm_c1a0a at: 1115 x, 3175 y, 480 z players : 1 humans, 0 bots (1 max) edicts : 1269 used of 2048 max # userid name uniqueid connected ping loss state adr # 4 "The Silent Dapper Darkness" STEAM_ID_PENDING 03:17 15 0 active loopback
I know beyond a reason of a doubt that I have suit armor.
[url='https://images.akamai.steamusercontent.com/ugc/545278974034093818/94E3CFD862ADB00D9CD6B340CA39E37CB0C2C834/']THIS SUIT IS BROKEN D:[/url]
